tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EventDetails (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_time TIME,
  event_location VARCHAR(255),
  attendees INT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    event_location TEXT,
    event_attendees INT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_time TIME,
  event_location VARCHAR,
  event_attendees INT
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name TEXT,
  event_date DATE,
  event_time TIME,
  event_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events ( 
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    time TIME, 
    location TEXT, 
    attendees INT 
);
